snippet.title: Enigmata - Game Preview / Gameplay
snippet.description:
Mixed with techno and space theme concept, Enigmata could be one of the coolest shooting games. The player must move around and shoot various enemy spacecrafts. The level will end once the player kills the stage boss. Enigmata also features massive amount of power ups for the player to grab; enhancing the ships overall for a short period of time. The player will earn gold from destroyed enemies and from the cleared level. Enigmata offers a huge collection of upgrade in the shop where the player can build a ship for any type of gameplay like full offense or full defense. New spacecraft can be purchased too giving additional expansion on the player's gameplay.
